title: How to Cook Indian Vegetables Chopped With Beetroot

steps.headline: Cut the beetroot and carrot and boil them till they are cooked well and let them cool, smash the vegetables and add salt according to taste.
Heat oil in a big frying pan and add the sliced onions till it gets golden brown colour.
steps.description: Once the onion get brown add ginger paste, cumin powder and chili powder (optional) and sauté till mixed well.

steps.headline: Now add the smashed vegetables into the pan with onions and spices and mix everything well.
Now turn off the flame and keep the pan aside and let the mixture get cool
Take chopped peanuts and fry them in very little oil in separate pan.
Add the fried peanuts to the smashed vegetable and cooked onion mixture.
Make balls out of this mixture ( the ball size can be according to your choice)
Now mix the white flour with some water and make a fine batter.
Now dip each of the vegetable balls in the batter and after dipping the balls in batter, coat each ball with the bread crumbs and place onto a plate

Repeat the process for all the balls and then place them in the refrigerator for 2 hours or longer ( you can prepare the ball and keep in the refrigerator and cook only the required quantity only and cook remaining balls whenever you like)
Heat the oil in a pan and deep fry each vegetable ball till it turns golden brown in colour.
Vegetable and beetroot chop is ready to serve, serve the chops hot with salad, ketchup or mint sauce.
steps.description: Garnish with fresh green coriander  grated cheese
